name: My Summer Love
description:
This is a prototype that I made during the Camp FanJammer Game Jam (Jan. 22-24, 2016). Our game theme was "Camping with Friends" so I decided I would make a game based on summer camp.

I was experimenting with combining a Dating Simulator with RPG elements and allowing the player to go on "Battle Dates."

I had a lot of good ideas, but, as usual, I got bogged down with the details and was unable to submit before the "official" deadline. However, I'm still posting it here for all to see!

(Bonus Points if you can complete the Best Friends charm.)

If enough people have interest I might finish it, but I may not.
